perceivedVia.description: The sense through which this event was perceived (for debugging)

originalDescription.description: The original visual description before sense filtering

recipient_ids.description: Optional explicit perceiver list. Accepts literal arrays or placeholder strings that resolve to arrays at runtime.

excluded_actor_ids.description: Optional list of actor IDs to exclude from perception. Accepts literal arrays or placeholder strings that resolve to arrays at runtime.

actor_description.description: First-person description delivered to the actor. Passed through from DISPATCH_PERCEPTIBLE_EVENT. When provided, the actor receives this message without sensory filtering.

target_description.description: First-person description delivered to the target. Passed through from DISPATCH_PERCEPTIBLE_EVENT. When provided, the target receives this message with sensory filtering applied.

target_id.description: The ID of the target entity, if any. Used to route target_description to the correct recipient.

alternate_descriptions.description: Alternative descriptions passed from dispatch operation
